recipe.ingredients: 1 medium eggplant, sliced into 1/2-inch rounds, 2 medium zucchinis, sliced lengthwise into 1/4-inch strips, 1 red bell pepper, cut into quarters, 1 yellow bell pepper, cut into quarters, 1 red onion, cut into 1/2-inch rounds, 1/4 cup olive oil, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 1 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 teaspoon dried basil, Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste, 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese, 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, torn
recipe.directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic, oregano, and basil. Season with salt and pepper. Brush this mixture over the eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and red onion, Grill the vegetables in batches until tender and charred in spots, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. As they finish cooking, transfer the vegetables to a cutting board, Once cool enough to handle, chop the vegetables into bite-sized pieces and place them in a large bowl. Add the feta cheese and fresh basil, toss to combine. Adjust seasoning with more salt and pepper if needed. Serve salad at room temperature or chilled.
